data.eml:eml: Illustrated identification key to the genera of New World Micrelytrini (Hemiptera: Alydidae: Micrelytrinae), with description of two new genera, one new species and new distributional records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brailovsky, Harry (2019): Illustrated identification key to the genera of New World Micrelytrini (Hemiptera: Alydidae: Micrelytrinae), with description of two new genera, one new species and new distributional records. Zootaxa 4668 (3): 393-409, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4668.3.5
